protocol.name: P-GSE36360-1
protocol.text: ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA normalized signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE36360-2
protocol.text: Plants were grown on MS madium containing 2% sucrose and 0.3% gellan gum, under 12 h light / 12 h dark conditions for 18 days

protocol.name: P-GSE36360-3
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated by RNeasy (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) and the RNase-free DNase Set (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE36360-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets according to Affymetrix instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE36360-7
protocol.text: Summarization was performed by RMA using the original CEL files. The expression estimates of CHP file is calculated using the Affymetrix Statistical Algorithm for absolute analysis.
